attributes.action: Ban Sharia Law in the UK !!
attributes.additional_details:
Sharia Law is the Islamic legal system derived from the religious precepts of Islam, particularly the Quran and the Hadith.
It allows marriages of under age girls to older men 
Equality legislation is not recognised by Sharia Law, a wife becomes the mans property, 
There is no leaving Islam under Sharia Law, the punishment for apostasy is death for Muslim male apostates
The mandatory wearing of the Burqa / Niqab or veil for women in public
attributes.background:
I think its time that everyone stops skating around the issue of Sharia Law in the UK !!
Ask yourself the following questions :
What benefits does Sharia Law bring to the British people ?
What is British about Sharia Law ?
Why should British people be held accountable under Sharia Law ?
